title: SCAM Directive Generator Options Schema
description: Creates a new, generic directive definition in the given or default project.

path.description: The path at which to create the directive file, relative to the current workspace. Default is a folder with the same name as the directive in the project root.

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the directive?

skipTests.description: Do not create `spec.ts` test files for the new directive.

inlineScam.description: Create the `NgModule` in the same file as the Directive.

flat.description: Create the new files at the top level of the current project.

selector.description: The `HTML` selector to use for this directive.

prefix.description: The prefix to apply to the generated directive selector.

export.description: Specifies if the SCAM should be exported from the project's entry point (normally `index.ts`). It only applies to libraries.
